meanings.definition: An extinct family of rhinoceroses characterized by having two horns side by side on the nasal bone.
meanings.english_definition: An extinct family of rhinoceroses characterized by having two horns side by side on the nasal bone.

etymology.value: From the genus name *Diceratus* + *-idae* (standard suffix for animal families). *Diceratus* comes from Greek *di-* (two) + *keras* (horn) + *-atus* (having).
